title: Roblox VN
subTitle: Casual
desc:
Certificate of providing online video game services No. 62/GXN-PTTH&TTƒêT issued by the Department of Radio, Television and Electronic Information on April 4, 2024.
Roblox is the ultimate virtual universe that allows you to play, create, share experiences with friends and become anything you want. Play with millions of people and explore the endless diversity of vast worlds created by the global community!
Already have an account? Log in with your existing Roblox account and explore the entire Roblox universe.
MILLIONS OF WORLDS TO EXPLORE
Are you in the mood for an epic adventure? Do you want to compete with opponents around the world? Or do you just want to socialize and chat with friends online? A growing library of community-created worlds means there's always something new and exciting to play every day.
EXPLORE TOGETHER ANYTIME, ANYWHERE
Play and have fun. Roblox is fully cross-platform, meaning you can play with your friends and millions of others on your computer, mobile device, Xbox One, or VR headset.
BE ANYTHING YOU CAN IMAGINE
Get creative and show off your unique style! Customize your avatar with tons of hats, shirts, faces, gear, and other items. With an ever-growing catalog of items, there's no limit to the looks you can create.
CHAT WITH FRIENDS
Use the Party feature to easily and conveniently create a group of up to 6 friends and join in on a Roblox experience. Join your friends to move through different experiences together. Users 13 and older can also use Party chat to make voice calls or send messages. Connecting and chatting with friends on Roblox has never been easier!
CREATE YOUR OWN WORLD: https://www.roblox.com/develop
SUPPORT: https://en.help.roblox.com/hc/en-us
CONTACT: https://corp.roblox.com/contact/
PRIVACY POLICY: https://www.roblox.com/info/privacy
PARENTS' GUIDE: https://corp.roblox.com/parents/
Terms of Use: https://en.help.roblox.com/hc/en-us/articles/115004647846
PLEASE NOTE: You must have an internet connection to participate. Roblox works best over Wi-Fi.
